    loadMapFile(String mapFilename)
    The function `loadMapFile` reads a map file, extracts information about continents, countries, and borders, and returns a `GameMap` object containing this information.
    Continent
    mapContinent(String p_line, int p_continentId)
    The function takes a string and an integer as input, splits the string by space, and returns a new Continent object with the continent ID, name, and population extracted from the string.

  • Method Details

    • getMapFolderPath

      public String getMapFolderPath()
      The function returns the file path of the "maps" folder in the project's resources directory.
      Returns:
      The method is returning a string that represents the file path of the "maps" folder in the project's resources directory.

    • readCountries

      public Map<Integer,Country> readCountries(Scanner p_scanner, Map<Integer,Continent> p_continents)
      The function reads country data from a scanner and maps it to a collection of countries, associating each country with its corresponding continent.
      Parameters:
      p_scanner - The scanner object used to read the input file line by line.
      p_continents - p_continents is a map that contains the continents of the world. The key is an Integer representing the continent ID, and the value is a Continent object representing the continent.
      Returns:
      The method is returning a object containing continentID as key and Continent object as value.

    • parseBorders

      public void parseBorders(Map<Integer,Country> p_countries, Scanner p_scanner)
      The function parses a file containing country borders and adds the neighboring countries to each country object in a map.
      Parameters:
      p_countries - p_countries is a map object which stores the countries in the game. The keys are integers representing the country IDs, and the values are Country objects representing the countries themselves.
      p_scanner - A Scanner object used to read input from a file or other source.

    • readContinents

      public Map<Integer,Continent> readContinents(Scanner p_scanner)
      The function reads continent data from a scanner and returns a map of continent objects.
      Parameters:
      p_scanner - The parameter `p_scanner` is of type `Scanner`. It is used to read input from a source, such as a file or user input. In this method, it is used to read lines of text from the input source.
      Returns:
      The method is returning a object containing continentID as key and Continent object as value.

    • mapCountry

      public Country mapCountry(String p_line)
      The function takes a string as input, splits it into an array of substrings, and uses the substrings to create and return a new Country object.
      Parameters:
      p_line - The parameter `p_line` is a string that represents a line of data containing information about a country.
      Returns:
      The method is returning a Country object.

    • mapContinent

      public Continent mapContinent(String p_line, int p_continentId)
      The function takes a string and an integer as input, splits the string by space, and returns a new Continent object with the continent ID, name, and population extracted from the string.
      Parameters:
      p_line - The p_line parameter is a string that represents a line of data containing information about a continent.
      p_continentId - The p_continentId parameter is an integer that represents the unique identifier for the continent.
      Returns:
      The method is returning a Continent object.

    • loadMapFile

      public GameMap loadMapFile(String mapFilename)
      The function `loadMapFile` reads a map file, extracts information about continents, countries, and borders, and returns a `GameMap` object containing this information.
      Parameters:
      mapFilename - The mapFilename parameter is a String that represents the name of the map file that needs to be loaded.
      Returns:
      The method is returning a GameMap object.
